ePortfolio

Class Portfolio

  • java.lang.Object
    • ePortfolio.Portfolio

  • public class Portfolio
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents and Controls a investment portfolio.

        public static java.lang.String buy(java.lang.String type,
                                   java.lang.String symbol,
                                   java.lang.String name,
                                   int quantity,
                                   double price)
        Buy is used to buy stock for new and existing investments
        Parameters:
        type - is the type of investment to buy
        symbol - is the symbol to represent the investment
        name - is the investment name
        quantity - is the amount of units/stocks to buy
        price - is the price per unit/share
        Returns:
        a string containing status and invest object if succesfull

        keywordString - is a string of keywords to search for
        priceLow - is the low end of the price
        priceHigh - is the high end of the price
        Returns:
        a string containing investment object info for any matching investments
